15936.title: Cooperative Ecosystem Studies Unit, Rocky Mountain CESU
15936.description: The U.S. Geological Survey is offering a cooperative-agreement opportunity to universities that have the ability to conduct research on dendrohydrological reconstructions that meet the objectives outlined in the funding announcement.

15937.title: Youth violence and related issues in persistently dangerous schools CFDA 84.184V
15937.description: Each funding opportunity description is a synopsis of information in the Federal Register application notice. For specific information about eligibility, applicants should consult the official Federal Register notice.

15939.title: State data collection; technical assistance CFDA 84.373X
15939.description: This funding opportunity supports state data collection initiatives and provides technical assistance. Applicants should review the official Federal Register notice for detailed requirements.

15941.title: ROA 2007: A.6 Entry, Descent, and Landing 1
15941.description: NASA Headquarters released this Research Announcement (NRA) in support of the Aeronautics Research Mission Directorate. The opportunity focuses on foundational research related to entry, descent, and landing technologies.

17675.title: Volunteer Management
17675.description: The Corporation for National and Community Service announces up to $800,000 in grants to support nonprofit organizations in increasing volunteer retention and expanding volunteer program capacity.

39237.title: Nat'l Tech Asst & Rsrch Cntr to Promote Ldrshp for Emp & Econ Ind for Adults w/disabilities
39237.description: ODEP will award one cooperative agreement to establish a national technical assistance and research center to promote employment and economic independence for adults with disabilities.

39241.title: FY 2007 WIC Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT) Notice of Competitive Pre-Planning EBT Grant Solicitation
39241.description: The Food and Nutrition Service plans to award grant funds to WIC State agencies to support Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT) pre-planning activities.

39706.title: PRM NGO Projects in Southern Sudan
39706.description: Limited funding is available to support NGOs working in southern Sudan in support of Sudanese refugee repatriation and reintegration.

39707.title: PRM NGO Projects in the Great Lakes/Central Africa Region
39707.description: Funding is available to support repatriation and reintegration of refugees in the Great Lakes and Central Africa region, including Burundi and the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

39717.title: PRM NGO Projects in Chad
39717.description: Proposed activities should support refugees in Chad, including Sudanese and Central African Republic refugees, across sectors such as protection, health, and education.
